City of Crane Municipal Court
=============================



P.O. Box 56  
[115 W. 6th Street](https://goo.gl/maps/sMPZ3T6uVJq7DHXr8)  
[Crane, Texas 79731](https://goo.gl/maps/sMPZ3T6uVJq7DHXr8)



Mon-Fri 8AM – 4PM



[(432) 558-7747](tel:+14325587747)



(432) 558-3593



[Send Email](mailto:municipalcourt@crane.texas.gov)



Municipal Judge:

[Jump to Court Forms](https://crane.texas.gov/city-departments/municipal-court/#forms)

Municipal Court Judge
